ai-patthana16.43:0.2_0: Having given the immaculateness of the Dhamma
ai-patthana16.43:0.3_0: Only treating the names of the past, future, and present.
ai-patthana16.43:1.1_0: for in the past, future, or present conditions are not the cause or reason for the sake of the teaching.
ai-patthana16.43:2.1_0: for the past, future, or present.
